B

This function is called when the user either lets go or presses a button.

C

Combines all chunks in the irregular tile layer into a single matrix.

G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
This class implements all of the game logic.

Constructs a new instance of the game.
GameApp - Class in <Unnamed>
This class contains the entry point of the game.

GameRenderer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to render the game contents using the graphics context interface.
GameRenderer() - Constructor for class GameRenderer
 
GameUi - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a user interface of the game using Java's builtin AWT framework.
GameUi(Game) - Constructor for class GameUi
Constructs a new instance of a user interface.
GameView - Class in <Unnamed>
This class contains the window in which the game is rendered.
GameView() - Constructor for class GameView
This constructs a new instance of the game view.
getID() - Method in class Tile
Gets the ID of the tile.
getImagePath() - Method in class Tile
Gets the image associated with the tile.

This function gets a list of file names of all the maps for the game.

Gets the maximum boundary of the tile layer.
getMin() - Method in class IrregularTileLayer
Calculates the minimum position of the tile layer.

Gets a tile from the tile set.
getTileCount() - Method in class TileSet
Gets the number of tiles in the tile set.
getTitle() - Method in class Game
Gets the title of the game.
GraphicsContext - Interface in <Unnamed>
This class allows graphics to be drawn for the game without having to know whether we're using AWT or a different UI or graphics implementation.
GraphicsContextAwt - Class in <Unnamed>
This is an implementation of the graphics context class to work with the AWT framework.
GraphicsContextAwt(Graphics, int, int) - Constructor for class GraphicsContextAwt
Constructs a new graphics context.

I

insertMatrix(Matrix, int, int) - Method in class Matrix
Copies the values from another matrix onto this one.
IrregularTileLayer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a tile layer, part of a tile map, that has not yet been "normalized." Tile layers stored in the file are made up of "chunks", which are sections of a tile layer.
IrregularTileLayer() - Constructor for class IrregularTileLayer
Constructs a new instance of an irregular tile layer.

K

KeyboardController - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to implement game controls using a standard keyboard from the main window's key listener.
KeyboardController(Game, ReentrantLock) - Constructor for class KeyboardController
Constructs a new instance of a keyboard controller.
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class KeyboardController
Detects if one of the game buttons was hit and updates the button state in the game if one was.
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class KeyboardController
Detects if one of the game buttons has released and updates the button state in the game if it was.
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class KeyboardController
This function is required to implement the KeyListener interface but is not required for game controls.

A simple integer matrix, used for referencing tiles.

This function is just a stub.
MouseController - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used to relay mouse clicks from the user interface to the game (as button events.)
MouseController(Game, ReentrantLock) - Constructor for class MouseController
Constructs a new mouse controller instance.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class MouseController
This function is just a stub.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class MouseController
This function is just a stub.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class MouseController
This function receives the mouse press event from the main window and relays it to the game as a button press event.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class MouseController
This function receives the mouse release event from the main window and relays it to the game as a button release event.
